title: Subchapter L - Finance
content:
Subchapter L - Finance

State Regulations

Part 170 - Financial Accounting In School Districts (§ 170.1 to 170.14)

Part 171 - Duties Of District Superintendent (§ 171.1 to 171.2)

Part 172 - Extraclassroom Activity Funds (§ 172.1 to 172.6 to 172.7)

Part 173 - Fees (§ 173.1 to 173.3)

Part 174 - Computation Of Tuition Charges (§ 174.1 to 174.5)

Part 175 - State Aid (§ 175.1 to 175.44)

Part 176 - Apportionment Of Funds To Nonpublic Schools (§ 176.1 to 176.3)

Part 177 - Provision Of Services To Pupils Attending Nonpublic Schools (§ 177.1 to 177.3 to 177.6)

Part 178 - Summer Food Service Program For Children

Part 179 - Apportionment Of Funds To Educational Broadcast Councils (§ 179.1 to 179.8)

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
